title: Quartermaster
description: The Quartermaster manages the ship's supplies, rations, and crew discipline with an iron fist, acting as the Captain's trusted second-in-command, ensuring order and fairness in dividing the plunder among the scurvy dogs aboard.

title: Helmsman
description: The Helmsman steers the ship through stormy seas and treacherous reefs, using keen instincts and weathered charts to navigate perilous waters, keeping the vessel on course even when the kraken stirs below.

title: Boatswain
description: The Boatswain oversees the ship's maintenance, from rigging to hull repairs, and rallies the crew during fierce battles, barking orders to keep the sails taut and the decks ready for any storm or enemy broadside.

title: Gunner
description: The Gunner commands the ship's cannons, ensuring each shot strikes true in the chaos of battle, maintaining the powder and shot while braving enemy fire to sink rival ships and claim their glittering treasures.

title: Cook
description: The Cook conjures hearty meals from meager rations, keeping the crew fed and content despite rolling waves and dwindling supplies, wielding a cleaver and cunning to make even hardtack taste like a pirate's feast.

title: Navigator
description: The Navigator charts the ship's course by starlight and compass, deciphering ancient maps to dodge deadly shoals and find hidden coves, guiding the crew to riches while evading the clutches of Davy Jones' Locker.

title: Shipwright
description: The Shipwright crafts and mends the ship's timbers, from sturdy masts to watertight hulls, working tirelessly to keep the vessel afloat through storms and cannon fire, ensuring it remains a terror of the high seas.

title: Musician
description: The Musician lifts the crew's spirits with lively shanties and drumbeats, signaling commands in the heat of battle and keeping morale high, their tunes echoing across the waves as the ship sails toward glory.

title: Cooper
description: The Cooper fashions sturdy barrels to store rum, water, and provisions, ensuring they withstand the ship's rocking and salty air, their craft keeping the crew sustained on long voyages to distant, treasure-laden shores.

title: Sailmaker
description: The Sailmaker stitches and repairs the ship's sails, crafting canvas to catch the fiercest winds, their nimble hands ensuring the vessel glides swiftly toward plunder, even when storms tear at the rigging
